Load the packages used in the analysis below.

```{r load-pkgs, message=FALSE}
library(Matrix)
library(dplyr)
library(fastTopics)
```

Load data and results
---------------------

Load the droplet data.

```{r load-data}
load("../data/droplet.RData")
```

Load the $k = 7$ Poisson NMF model fit.

```{r load-fit}
fit <- readRDS("../output/droplet/rds/fit-droplet-scd-ex-k=7.rds")$fit
```

Load the clusters identified in the [clustering
analysis](clusters_droplet.html).

```{r load-clusters}
samples_droplet <- readRDS("../output/droplet/clustering-droplet.rds")
```
